+ "Whether DrJava should listen to a socket (see below) so it
"+

+ "can be remote controlled and told to open files.
"+
+                                                  "(Changes will not be applied until DrJava is restarted.)</html>"));

+ "A running instance of DrJava can be remote controlled and

+                                                  "told to open files. This specifies the port used for remote control.</html>"));
+    addOptionComponent(panel, new StringOptionComponent(OptionConstants.MASTER_JVM_XMX, "Maximum Heap Memory for Main JVM", this,

+ "The maximum heap the Main JVM can use. Leave blank for default.
"+

+ "Use plain integer numbers for bytes, or add 'k', 'M' or 'G' as
"+
+                                                 "suffix to indicate kilobytes, megabytes or gigabytes.</html>"));
+    addOptionComponent(panel, new StringOptionComponent(OptionConstants.SLAVE_JVM_XMX, "Maximum Heap Memory for Interactions JVM", this,

+ "The maximum heap the Interactions JVM can use. Leave blank for default.
"+

+ "Use plain integer numbers for bytes, or add 'k', 'M' or 'G' as
"+
+                                                 "suffix to indicate kilobytes, megabytes or gigabytes.</html>"));
